Chuck Norris Joke Generator

This project is demonstraing the use of external API. I used 'API|The Internet Chuck Norris Database' from http://www.icndb.com/api/. A user can fetch the number of Chuck Norris jokes. Some of key features you might be interested in from this work are:

  • HTML5 & CSS3 with simple Grid and flexbox
  • JavaScript with fetch API

To-Do App

This is a famous To-Do app and I created this app using React.js. A user can add, delete, and edit a task.

  • React.js
  • HTML5
  • Bootstrap
  • UUID
  • Font Awesome
